segments.text: Can I still catch T107 for Xiamen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir . The train has already left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad . Can I take another train ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Your ticket is valid for three days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great ! I will take the next train .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to have your ticket checked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No extra charge at all . But your berth will be invalid .
segments.speaker: S2
